cause.description:
Just because Picasso was successful isn't an excuse, bad art exists and those who create must learn to express themselves without being bad at it.
1. Bring an end to bad artwork.
2. Canada's seal hunt must end immediately.
3. Health care is a universal right.
4. Abolish the use of wet paper.
cause.mission: share our talents with the world
cause.name: Artists for the Unartistic
